titles.title: To amend the Equity in Educational Land-Grant Status Act of 1994 to add White Earth Tribal and Community College to the list of 1994 Institutions.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Risk Management, Research and Specialty Crops.

committee.subcommittee: Risk Management, Research and Specialty Crops
committee.name: House Agriculture

bill.summary: 9/25/2000--Introduced. Amends the Equity in Educational Land-Grant Status Act of 1994 to add White Earth Tribal and Community College to the list of 1994 Institutions, which are considered land-grant colleges but which are not considered eligible for certain types of funding.
